title: HW Oriented Secur Trust
description:
Fundamental concepts, foundation, and methodologies for the design of trustworthy circuits including protection of the
hardware platform against tampering. Physical cloning of cryptographic VLSI circuits.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3170 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
